description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Stick Unleashed is a stickman shooter. Run, duck, jump, wall-jump, and even fly a helicopter on your own, or as a team of up to 4 through the campaign mode! Build your own levels in 'Stick Create', or play competitive VS or team VS games!
description.short: Stick Unleashed is a stickman shooter. Run, duck, jump, wall-jump, and even fly a helicopter on your own, or as a team of up to 4 through the campaign mode! Build your own levels in 'Stick Create', or play competitive VS or team VS games!
